		Question: where do most of the people live in russia
		Answer:
answer: Most of the people in Russia live in the western part of the country, near the border with Europe. This is because the western part of Russia has a more temperate climate and is more fertile than the eastern part of the country. The western part of Russia is also home to the country's largest cities, including Moscow and Saint Petersburg.
